item.title: Born for Street: Design Story of Moca
item.description: Born for Street: Design Story of Moca Since 2014 when I first started photography with a proper camera, so far I’ve used a range of cameras and lenses, I’ve been chasing the latest and greatest gears and also jumped between different combinations of cameras and lenses for street photography. While I enjoyed trying different equipments, I always find different issues with different cameras for street photography. It’s difficult to design a modern camera and it’s almost impossible to get it right for different photography purposes, so we can’t fail a camera simply because it’s not great for street photography.
